Package ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.node

Class AbstractDecisionNode

java.lang.Object
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.node.AbstractNode
ai.nettogrof.battlesnake.treesearch.node.AbstractDecisionNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractEvaluationNode, AlphaNode
public abstract class AbstractDecisionNode
extends AbstractNode
This abstract node class is the based of all node class, provide basic update Score Currently using Paranoid only, I hope to add MaxN soon
Version:
Fall 2021
Author:
carl.lajeunesse
